description.en:
[b]1. Still Can't Reach the Milky Way[/b] [i](Mada Amanogawa ni Ikenai)[/i]
Like Orihime and Hikoboshi, Kira and Yuriha can only meet once a year when Kira visits Japan. Can feelings grow under such circumstances?

[b]2. 10-Year Rain[/b] [i](Juunen no Ame)[/i]
Sakura's childhood friend Kashiwaze has grown up to a popular guy, and to keep from being ostracized by the girls she hides their friendship and ignores him. 

[b]3. Koi ni Ichiban Chikai Shima[/b]

[b]4. Senaka Watte Koi (w)o Suru[/b]

[b]4. Senaka Watte Koi (w)o Suru Bangaihen[/b]

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/まだ天の川にいけない-マーガレットコミックスDIGITAL-森下suu-ebook/dp/B00CBC1J32/
